@graph.headline: Want to Upsell on Shopify and Actually Make More Money?
@graph.description: Learn how to effectively upsell on Shopify by installing upsell apps, creating specific offers, and displaying them at optimal times to increase average order value and customer lifetime value.

@graph.name: How to Upsell on Shopify
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to implementing upselling strategies on Shopify

supply.name: Upsell App from Shopify App Store

step.name: Install an Upsell App
step.text: First install an upsell app from the Shopify App Store. This is non-negotiable for effective upselling.

step.name: Create Specific Offers
step.text: Create actual offers that suggest a better, pricier product upgrade with clear value proposition.

step.name: Display Offers Strategically
step.text: Display these offers on product pages, in the cart, or at checkout for maximum visibility.

step.name: Implement Post-Purchase Upsells
step.text: Present post-purchase upsells on the thank you page for one-click acceptance.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Upselling
hasDefinedTerm.description: A sales strategy to get a customer to buy a more expensive version of something they're already looking at, focusing on upgrades and premium options to increase average order value.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Cross-selling
hasDefinedTerm.description: A sales technique that recommends related or complementary items to go with the main purchase, thinking horizontally rather than vertically.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Average Order Value (AOV)
hasDefinedTerm.description: The average dollar amount spent each time a customer places an order, a key metric for measuring upselling success.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
hasDefinedTerm.description: The total worth of a customer to a business over the whole period of their relationship, enhanced through effective upselling strategies.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify
hasDefinedTerm.description: A multinational e-commerce platform that allows individuals and businesses to create their own online stores and sell products or services.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify App Store
hasDefinedTerm.description: Shopify's marketplace for third-party applications that extend store functionality, including specialized upselling tools.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Post-Purchase Upsells
hasDefinedTerm.description: Offers shown to customers after they've completed their purchase, typically on the thank you page with one-click acceptance.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Pre-Purchase Upsells
hasDefinedTerm.description: Offers displayed to shoppers before they complete their purchase, shown on product pages, in cart, or during checkout.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Down-selling
hasDefinedTerm.description: Offering a less expensive alternative when a customer appears ready to abandon their purchase due to price concerns.
